patthana8.25:4.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto nasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.25:4.2: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.25:4.3: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto nasaññojaniyo ca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.25:5.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ naasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.25:6.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyañca saññojanavippayuttaṃ naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.25:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
